Articles.Content:
I'm making a little planet pack but I don't know how to make height maps or boimes.

If any one could help I would repay you in some way.

Edited September 1, 2016 by Plink456

I'm in the process of figuring out how to make planets myself. I'm using Gimp and downloaded a Gimp plugin NormalMap that takes a height map and makes a normal map. Used Wilber to make the height map. Biomes are just a png or dss picture with a color for each biome - you then refer to the RGB color in the cfg file - example a pure red spot on the biome map would have an entry in the config file like:

            Biome
                    {
                            name = Shallows
                            value = 1.0
                            color = 1,0,0,1
                    }


Note: color = Red, Green, Blue, Alpha so pure red is 1, 0, 0, 1 (Alpha is 1 unless your using transparency in your biome colors - no real need to do that)
Hey thanks. Good luck on the mod

Well I tried many times but I found out I'm bad at making textures and height maps. 

But I'm good with the stuff that doesn't have to do with height maps and texturing.

Planet ideas

Tyr: a dark red jupiter like gas gaint.

Rigoo: a tiny asteroid orbiting Tyr with a molten surface and a super volcano.

Frith: a big moon with a lot of mountains and flood valleys between those mountains.

Roho: Tyr last moon thats a small snowball that has a gaint crack in it.

Wyth: a very orange gas gaint that's about the size of eve but it has the half the mass of Jool.

Dery: a sandy and Oceany moon with a sea on the side that faces Wyth becuase the tides from Wyth pull the water there.

Grid: a dull boring moon.

Wyth's last moon Kyl: an egg shape moon the rotates once evry 30 minutes.

Kriff: A gaint purple gas gaint thats bigger than Jool.

Jov: A dark red Minmus like world.

Tholk: A ringed Pol like moon.

Ghit: A Icy world with a few cracks with lava coming out.

Coma: A bright green comet the passes by every 230 years.

Whink: A tiny moonlet orbiting Coma.

Luto: A Icy dwarf planet with a heart.

Piddle: A Red moon for Luto.

Uty: Luto's small captured Moon.

Ty: Uty's submoonlet.

Vul: A lava world closer to the sun than Moho.

Veebol: A gray world that's more boring than Dres.

Vl2: Veelbol's moon.

Hame: A oval shaped dwarf planet.

Spoo: Asteroid Orbiting Hame.

Woo:Other asteroid orbiting Hame.

Lint: Dres's "interesting" moon.

Dibble:A N.K.A(Near Kerbin Asteroid.)

Diboon: Dibble's Moonlet.

Dibit:Diboon's Submoonlet.

Dibis:Dibit's little subsubmoonlet.

Dib: the 3 kilometer big subsubsubmoonlet of Dibis that everybody seems to care about.

Floon: Moho's little moon.

Coople: Jool's new far out heavily cratered moon.

Xen: A far out dwarf planet dubbed the Luto killer.

Dy: Xen's Huge Lava moon.

Orcule:Another Luto Killer.

Van: Orcule's moon

Sel: A distant Dwarf.

Froggle: A gaint blue Duna like world the has only completed 50 oribits around Kerbol so far

And lastly Klin and Thik Eeloo's two little shepered moon's.

Also Eeloo now has rings like Chariklo.

That's most of my idea's and the most planet's my computer can handle.

 

So no more planets.

Edited August 26, 2016 by Plink456

8 hours ago, Plink456 said:

I found out I'm bad at making textures and height maps.

Only one way to get better!

But seriously - if you really want to do them do so. If they don't turn out so be it - you'll probably look back and realized you've learned something along the way and if you decide to try again it will probably be better.
How do you give a planet lava?

Here are image's of what if done so far. Hope this link works. http://imgur.com/a/u6fLi

(This has been updated to add an image of Rigoo.)

Edited August 27, 2016 by Plink456
Alright The gas giant's are finished and I'm working Rigoo's biomes and height map.
Alright again I need help Giving Rigoo Crater's and Lava other than that Rigoo's done
Does anyone have any texture Idea's for Frith?

This mod is cancelled because of problem's making Rigoo.

I may come back so day but probaly not.

Hey, hey, hey. Don't give up just yet! I could collaborate on this if you'd like, provide better gas giant textures (don't want to offend you, but the current ones look like something made with MS Paint, I could make a better texture for that with my GIMP skills), and help you with building all of  those planets without using external textures, using only code.

The thing is though that you seem to give up easily. Let me tell you something, when I was learning the basics of Kopernicus there were times where the thought 'screw it, I'll never get the hang of this' crossed my mind, but I wanted to make planets, so dang I'd make those planets too! I stayed determined and I kept staring at configs until I understood it.

Nowadays I've made several tutorials to help people understand it better, but like driving, real experience is gained in the field. You can't just read a guide and expect to make flawless planets, you may know what to write, but the only way to truly envision the effects of your settings is by trial and error, just keep coding!

The problem I see with Rigoo in the image is a deformity and frequency that is way too high for a body it's size. Also, try setting Gilly or Ike as a template when making asteroids, since those have asteroid-like properties it'll give the final product asteroid-like properties as well.

For lava you need a new texture, I can provide that as well, and a mod called HazardousOcean, which I'm more than happy to write for you. Craters is VoronoiCraters, which I'll have to explain in detail.

But don't lose hope yet!

Yay I'm not giving up yet. and yes the texture were made in ms paint and gimp because those are the only paint softwares I have but don't worry I'll make better ones. The only reason why Rigoo is Kerbin for the ocean I'm Probally goin to change it though

Hey that would be awsome and that space engine texture will be used.

Just be careful, like white guardian said. People dont like using space engine. I suggest you start off with space engine while making basic maps of planets using something NOT ms paint, and when your art skills have improved. Add detailed maps that you make using the art tool!

How do I make custom Science def's

6 hours ago, Plink456 said:

How do I make custom Science def's

My way is to take out the science def's from New horizons and wire it for whatever mod I'm working for
